Program_Title: Rep. Phil Roe (R-TN) Speaks in Support of the No Taxpayer Funding for Abortion Act

Headlines: Rep. Phil Roe (R-TN) has delivered over 5,000 babies through his practice as a obstetrician and gynecologist. Rep. Roe has seen life at all stages and understands that unborn children are human life. He praises Rep. Chris Smith and talks about all the young people he have seen grown up in his community who could have been killed through abortion. Rep. Roe challenges any medical indication for a third-trimester abortion.
